_header: An Hermit woned in the wilderness / That proved his disciple buxomness
_description: The Obedient Servant, in the Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BodSelSup52.First Lines:
AN herymet wenyd in a wylderneys& tagh hys dyscypyll in
                    buxumneyse…
BodSelSup52.Last Lines:
…& gyf vs grace to be buxum& tyll hys endles blys to
                    com

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Ane Ermite woned in wildirnesþat prouid his dissipil
                    bowsomness…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…And giue vs grace to be bowsomeþat we to heuene to him
                    maye come
